Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Relates to the use of single use plastic garment bags and dry cleaning bags
Summary: Prohibits dry cleaning establishments from returning clothing to customers in single use garment bags; allows dry cleaning establishments to return clothing to customers in reusable bags provided by such customers or offer for sale a reusable bag.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to the use of single use plastic garment bags and dry cleaning bags
